of the Landgren and Collins Families

Family Tree Lineage Index
Nils Andersson

On the 16th of Novemeber, 1836, Nils Andersson was born to Anna Hansdotter and Anders Danielsson in No. 7 Genarp, Genarp parish, Malmöhus county (1A). The family lived in Genarp No. 7 until 1838 (1B) when they moved to Galtesjöhus farm or village in Genarp parish (1C). Nils lived with his family in Galtesjöhus for 13 years (1C, 1D, 1E) until he moved away for a year in 1857 to live in Kornheddinge in Kyrkheddinge parish (1F). After he moved back home to Galtesjöhus, the family lived there for another nine years (1G, 1H) before moving to Hafslemölla in 1867, the same year Nils married Kjerstina Christensdotter on the 19th of April.

Two years later, their daughter Anna was born on the 27th of May, 1869 (4). Anna lived with Nils and Kjerstina in Hafslemölla (Grentige No. 8), Genarp, Malmöhus until the 10th of October, 1884, when she moved away from home (1J, 1K, 1L). Kjerstina and Nils continued to live in Hafslemölla (Grentige No. 8), Genarp, at least through 1916 where the online records drop off (2A). On the 20th of July, 1920, Nils died in Hafslemölla in Genarp parish at the age of 83, just one month before his wife’s death (5).
